expected_policies.justification: Provides comprehensive golf cover (equipment, green fees, hole-in-one) and potentially superior buggy cover via higher Rental Vehicle Excess (S$1500). Also has better travel delay trigger (4hrs).
Only policy with dedicated 'Golf Cover' section in JSON explicitly mentioning equipment, hole-in-one, unused green fees, and buggy damage (S$500 limit).
Includes 'Pet care' benefit (covering kennel/cattery fees due to delay) directly in the plan according to JSON.
Includes 'Pet care' benefit (covering kennel/cattery fees due to delay) directly in the plan according to JSON.
JSON explicitly lists 'Public transport double indemnity' benefit.
JSON explicitly lists 'Public transport double indemnity' benefit.
JSON explicitly lists 'Public transport double cover for accidental death' benefit.
JSON explicitly lists 'Public transport double cover for accidental death' benefit.
No standard cover for specific family event cancellation. Best partial solution via optional CFAR add-on (50% payout). Assumes add-on purchased.
No standard cover for specific family event cancellation. Alternative partial solution via included TIAR benefit (likely 50% payout, requires purchase within 30 days of booking).
